item.title: Ninja Fruit Slice
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Ninja Fruit Slice is a classic arcade game. The rule is simple, slice every fruit but not the bomb. You are going to be the fruit ninja and cut up as many fruits as possible to win a high score. Don’t slice bombs or miss fruit.On PCDrag the mouse to cut.On mobileSlide the screen to […]
item.content:encoded:
Ninja Fruit Slice is a classic arcade game. The rule is simple, slice every fruit but not the bomb. You are going to be the fruit ninja and cut up as many fruits as possible to win a high score. Don’t slice bombs or miss fruit.
On PCDrag the mouse to cut.On mobileSlide the screen to cut.
